title: IMF Finalizes Systematic Economic Transformation of Southeast Asian Economies
summary: By mid-1998, the IMF completes its comprehensive restructuring of Southeast Asian economies, implementing radical free-market reforms that fundamentally reshape the region's economic landscape. These interventions prioritize Western corporate interests, dismantle local economic protections, and create long-term dependency on international financial institutions.

sources.title: IMF Comprehensive Report on Asian Financial Crisis Interventions
